title: Shimano Special Editions: Tropical Leaves With Lazer & Champagne for Spring Classics
content:
Shimano is rolling out special editions for gravel and road. Complete the kit with a matching helmet from Lazer.

The post Shimano Special Editions: Tropical Leaves With Lazer & Champagne for Spring Classics appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
